segments.text: That boy on the stool makes me incredibly nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His legs are splayed out, and the stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he's going to tumble backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on those cookies, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's expectant face shows their teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are completely unaware of the danger they are in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The image of him falling with that plate is quite vivid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really ought to stabilize that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a terrible accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout at them to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to these children?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent mischief is overshadowed by the peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt from this cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR
